column4: hello, i wanna move a bunch of files in a bunch of different folders to another folder, renaming the files with their original folders names. Is that possible to do in a quick way with the terminal?
you can probably  do it with 'rename'.
a little bit of regex and scripting foo will be required.
I can give you the pointer, but I'm not going to do the work for you and spoonfeed it to you.
